sources.title: The Tell-Tale Heart
sources.description: Title: The Tell-Tale Heart Summary: When Edgar sees his girlfriend Betty getting up close and personal with his best friend Carl, he murders Carl in a jealous rage and hides the corpse under the floor of his piano room. Comes... Directed by: Ernest Morris Actors: Laurence Payne, Adrienne Corri, Dermot Walsh Production Company: Danziger Productions Ltd. Release Date: December 1960 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 When Edgar sees his girlfriend Betty getting up close and personal with his best friend Carl, he murders Carl in a jealous rage and hides the corpse under the floor of his piano room. Comes the night, and Edgar begins to hear strange sounds coming from under the floor...

metadata.Plot: When Edgar sees his girlfriend Betty getting up close and personal with his best friend Carl, he murders Carl in a jealous rage and hides the corpse under the floor of his piano room. Comes the night, and Edgar begins to hear strange sounds coming from under the floor...
metadata.Writer: Brian Clemens, Eldon Howard, Edgar Allan Poe
metadata.Actors: Laurence Payne, Adrienne Corri, Dermot Walsh
